subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hello! Ques. about DC Six or Seven and Real Time recording
author: Lisby
full_text:
Was this made specifically for EVP? Looking at the site, it looks  
commercial.  How does it work for EVP? I'm very interested, but I  
know nothing about this type of program at all. How do you make it  
work for you to record EVP?

Ann

On Oct 29, 2007, at 5:45 PM, wingd_with_awe wrote:

> Hi,it's been awhile since I've logged on here but just popping in to
> say hi gang! Glad that y'all are here!
>
> I saw some information in another ITC forum about DC Six, an audio
> editor that allows one to record EVP in Real Time... and it's
> awesome! Has anyone here tried out the demo version of this program
> that's now been updated to DC Seven?
>
> Anyway, I've been experimenting with it and it's really amazing. I
> can talk into it and some of my EVP contacts answer back right away.
> But because I am not knowledgeable about sound recorders except for
> the basics when it comes to editing my EVP, I would like to know if
> someone here could download the 10 day trial version of DC Seven and
> let me know what you think about it. I'm having a few problems with
> getting it to work as it's probably supposed to work... mainly having
> a problem with feedback and so on..
> Here's the link to DC Seven's 10 trial demo:
> http://www.enhancedaudio.com/dc_seven.htm
> Hope someone here will try it out because I would love to know if it
> works for you!
>
> wingd
>
>
>
